24.movie_plot: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

148.movie_plot: A bitter, aging couple, with the help of alcohol, use a young couple to fuel anguish and emotional pain towards each other.

113.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

131.movie_name: Seven Samurai (The Magnificent Seven) (Shichinin no samurai) (1954)
131.movie_plot: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

52.movie_plot: Set in the 1880s, the story of how, during a creative dry spell, the partnership of the legendary musical/theatrical writers Gilbert and Sullivan almost dissolves, before they turn it all around and write the Mikado.

98.movie_plot: Following the death of a publishing tycoon, news reporters scramble to discover the meaning of his final utterance.

25.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
25.movie_plot: After the rebels are overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda. His friends accept shelter from a questionable ally as Darth Vader hunts them in a plan to capture Luke.

156.movie_plot: A spoiled heiress running away from her family is helped by a man who is actually a reporter in need of a story.

19.movie_plot: The incredible story of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, told by his peer and secret rival Antonio Salieri - now confined to an insane asylum.

93.movie_plot: Both dumped by their girlfriends, two best friends seek refuge in the local mall.

51.movie_plot: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

3.movie_plot: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite what the Principal thinks of that.

127.movie_plot: A mute alien with the appearance of a black human is chased by outer-space bounty hunters through the streets of Harlem.

95.movie_plot: The staff of an army hospital in the Korean war find that laughter is the best way to deal with their situation.

21.movie_name: Like Water for Chocolate (Como agua para chocolate) (1992)
21.movie_plot: When tradition prevents her from marrying the man she loves, a young woman discovers she has a unique talent for cooking.

134.movie_plot: In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team.

108.movie_plot: When a rich woman's ex-husband and a tabloid-type reporter turn up just before her planned remarriage, she begins to learn the truth about herself.

124.movie_plot: Two girls have an intense fantasy life; their parents, concerned the fantasy is too intense, separate them, and the girls take revenge.

146.movie_plot: An ophthalmologist's mistress threatens to reveal their affair to his wife while a married documentary filmmaker is infatuated with another woman.

54.movie_plot: What do an elderly topiary gardener, a retired lion tamer, a man fascinated by mole rats, and a cutting-edge robotics designer have in common? Both nothing and everything in this ...

101.movie_plot: Denice Crosby takes a first look at the huge fans of Star Trek and how the series from around America has affected and shaped their lives.

159.movie_plot: A man seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

32.movie_plot: Watch the story of history's greatest gladiator unfold with graphic violence and the passions of the women that love them. This is Spartacus.

89.movie_plot: A drama critic learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are homicidal maniacs, and that insanity runs in his family.

71.movie_plot: A boy who communicates with spirits that don't know they're dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

116.movie_plot: Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditzy Annie Hall.

166.movie_plot: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.
